node.excerpt: Coding for kids is an important skill to have for the generation. Many youth have made major web browsers and search engines in the past 20 years such as: Google, ksgv2 and Mozilla Firefox. Here I will browse over my personal opinions of where to start. Scratch For young coders just getting started, I highly recommend . It gives you many options. It is great for a kid that wants to make a pretty straightforward game. It is by far the best choice for a quick, fun game. Although I would love new blocks and ways to write . Overall I think it is the best place to start . Code.org Code.org is a fun way to start coding having by far the most options and customizable choices.
